summary: It\'s that simple. This savegame takes you a few seconds before you are prompted to choose your race and name.
descriptionHtml:
It\'s that simple. This savegame takes you a few seconds before you are prompted to choose your race and name.

Instructions

1. Find your savegame folder. It\'s usually in a directory similar to \"...My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves\"
2. Extract the downloaded file inside the \'Saves\' folder.
3. It\'s wise to move/delete any other file that was in the folder to start a new save count.
author: Ronlaw
